title: Resort-Style Swimming Pool with Lounging Ledge, Poolside Wi-Fi

contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Welcome to Pinnacle Ridge', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 640 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Pinnacle Ridge is a beautiful apartment community located just west of Downtown Dallas.', 'Our prime location gives our residents stunning views.', 'We are proud to offer newly renovated units with white cabinetry, upgraded lighting and plumbing fixtures, plank flooring, digital thermostats, upgraded window coverings and more.', 'Pinnacle Ridge also offers a beautiful new pergola covered grill station and leash free dog park and as part of our continued efforts to provide our Residents with the best possible amenity package we are in the process of revitalizing several of our amenity spaces.', 'Ask our team about the new Leasing Office, Fitness Center,
